channel.title: New future bass track “Drop of Water” out now!
channel.description:
Here’s a future bass track I started a few months ago that I thought had some potential so I spent a couple days fixing it up and finishing it.
Here’s the track: https://soundcloud.com/colin-m-348193009/time-a-drop-of-water
It’s got some pretty basic chords but I tried to make the drop sound unique to other future bass songs, anyway, hope you enjoy!
